text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Stop being a twat and stirring up a blame game, it's chip paper journalism. Yes, Hancock was nieve to be pushed into an unrealistic number and time frame, but nows not the time to mud sling. The quality of the press over this crisis, including you, has been absolutely shite.
